name: AzureResourceGroupDeployment
description: Provision, Deploy and Perform Actions on a Azure Resource Group
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure subscription to target for the deployment.

inputs.name: action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to be performed on the Azure resources or resource group.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of the resource group.

inputs.name: location
inputs.label: Location
inputs.visibleRule: action = Create Or Update Resource Group

inputs.name: csmFile
inputs.label: Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the Azure Resource Manager template. For more information on templates see - http://aka.ms/azuretemplates.
inputs.visibleRule: action = Create Or Update Resource Group

inputs.name: csmParametersFile
inputs.label: Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path for the parameters file corresponding to the Azure Resource Manager Template.
inputs.visibleRule: action = Create Or Update Resource Group

inputs.name: overrideParameters
inputs.label: Override Template Parameters
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify the template parameters to be overridden in the format
-parameterName $(variableName) or
-parameterName parameterValue
inputs.visibleRule: action = Create Or Update Resource Group

inputs.name: skipCACheck
inputs.label: Skip CA Check
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this option is selected, client skips the validation that the server certificate is signed by a trusted certificate authority (CA) when connecting over Hypertext Transfer Protocol over Secure Socket Layer (HTTPS).

inputs.name: dscDeployment
inputs.label: Refresh SAS token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Refresh SAS token for the Azure blobs that are used in the template. Useful if the SAS token expires quickly.

inputs.name: moduleUrlParameterName
inputs.label: Azure Blob Parameter
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Names of the parameter corresponding to the Azure blobs separated by ; in the format
url1;url2;url3

inputs.name: sasTokenParameterName
inputs.label: SAS Token Parameter
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Names of the SAS token parameters separated by ; in the format
token1;token2;token3
